import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Restart16, ArrowRight16 } from '@carbon/icons-react'; import { DatePicker, DatePickerInput } from "carbon-components-react" import moment from 'moment'; import './overview-page.scss' import PercentRing from "../../components/PercentRing/PercentRing" import OverviewTable from "../../components/OverviewTable/OverviewTable" import { getDictCount, getLayeredDictCount, getUniqueUsers } from "../../utils" import config from '../../config'; class OverviewPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { lastUpdated: moment().format('h:mm A') } } datesChanged = (dates) => { let startDate = moment(dates[0]).format("L") let endDate = moment(dates[1]).format("L") this.props.dispatch({ type: config.OVERVIEW_DATES_CHANGED, startDate: startDate, endDate: endDate }) } render() { const dividerStyle = {width: "100%", height: "1px", background: "#f4f4f4", marginTop: "24px"} return

suggestions below to start your analysis by filtering conversations

} } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { let props = { statsLoaded: state.statsLoaded, uniqueUsers: 0, uniqueSessions: 0, requestCount:0, recognized: 0, notRecognized: 0, overviewStartDate: state.overviewStartDate, overviewEndDate: state.overviewEndDate, minDate: state.minDate, maxDate: state.maxDate }; if (state.statsLoaded) { props.uniqueUsers = getUniqueUsers(state.uniqueUsers, state.overviewStartDate, state.overviewEndDate) props.uniqueSessions = getDictCount(state.uniqueSessions, state.overviewStartDate, state.overviewEndDate) props.requestCount = getDictCount(state.requestCounts, state.overviewStartDate, state.overviewEndDate) let recCounts = getLayeredDictCount(state.recognized, state.overviewStartDate, state.overviewEndDate) props.recognized = recCounts.recognized props.notRecognized = recCounts.notRecognized } return props } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(OverviewPage)
